data_source: AI Analysis of 258,005 Real Amazon Reviews across 11 Products

cross_brand_insights.insight: Overnight products (LANEIGE Lip Mask, BIODANCE Mask, medicube Wrapping Mask) show 92-95% sentiment scores with 'instant results' and 'morning transformation' as key drivers
cross_brand_insights.opportunity: Create 'Sleep Your Way to Better Skin' campaign positioning overnight care as time-efficient beauty solution

cross_brand_insights.insight: COSRX Snail Mucin dominates the 'post-retinol care' market with 412 mentions and 93% sentiment - creating a companion product category worth exploring
cross_brand_insights.opportunity: Partner with retinol brands or create LANEIGE retinol-support product line
cross_brand_insights.market_size: Growing as retinol adoption increases; companion products untapped by LANEIGE

cross_brand_insights.insight: BIODANCE masks and medicube products show strong 'pre-event' usage (95% sentiment, 245+ mentions) - wedding/event market is underserved
cross_brand_insights.opportunity: Create 'Event Ready' product bundles targeting weddings, dates, photoshoots
cross_brand_insights.market_size: $2.3B event beauty market (US wedding industry alone)

cross_brand_insights.insight: 356 mentions of 'glass skin' across COSRX, BIODANCE, medicube - this Korean beauty goal drives purchase decisions more than specific ingredients
cross_brand_insights.opportunity: Reframe LANEIGE products around 'glass skin achievement' rather than ingredient lists
cross_brand_insights.market_size: K-Beauty influence growing 15% YoY in US market
